facts: The scene takes place in some non-descript apartment's bathroom
We can hear the whining motor of a high-powered drain-rod.
The spiral cable whips wildly, spiraling deeper into the tub drain, black goo splattering everywhere.
The machine is so loud Corky almost cannot hear someone pounding on the apartment door.
Corky stops the machine, stands and goes to the door.
Behind the door is Violet, wearing jeans, a white T-shirt and cowboy boots.
Both Violet and Corky live in the same apartment building
Violet is carrying 2 cups of hot coffee
comm_style: Corky, a very butch-looking woman with short hair. She is a lesbian and wants people to know it.
Corky is a tough, alluring, and resourceful individual
Corky's past as a convict has given her a sense of independence and self-reliance, allowing her to navigate the treacherous world of organized crime with ease.
Violet is a piece of sexual candy that would melt in your mouth
Violet pretends to be a naive blonde
Violet is a former sex worker, homemaker, and conwoman who is semi-closeted as a lesbian.
Violet is a high femme, characterized by her short curly black hair, thin arched black eyebrows, dark brown eyes, and signature deep scarlet lipstick.
Violet is driven by a desire for freedom and autonomy.
Violet wants to escape her unhappy relationship with Caesar and claim her rightful share of the stolen money.
goals: Violet offers Corky a cup of coffee
Corky goes back to the bathroom and cleans her hands
Violet asks Corky for a favor - so that Corky wouldn't be using her powertools at night
Corky tells Violet about her truck, a '63 Chevy
